alert.note: Alert for Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 8:18PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Collier County through 900 PM EDT... At 817 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud 7 miles east of Golden Gate Estates, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Golden Gate Estates and Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
